data.headline: Junior Data Scientist
data.summary: Passionate self-taught data scientist with a strong background in machine learning and a keen interest in applying data-driven insights to solve complex problems. Experienced in data analysis, model development, and deploying solutions in various industries. Committed to continuous learning and staying up-to-date with the latest advancements in the field.

experience.title: Data Analyst Intern
bullets: Conducted data extraction, cleaning, and preprocessing for various client projects
Developed and tested machine learning models to predict customer churn and sales trends
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to present data-driven insights and recommendations

experience.title: Data Science Freelancer
bullets: Provided data analysis and machine learning solutions to small and medium-sized businesses
Designed and implemented data pipelines to automate data processing and model deployment
Conducted research on the application of deep learning techniques in the client's domain

experience.title: Junior Data Scientist
bullets: Developed and optimized machine learning models for predictive analytics and decision support
Collaborated with domain experts to understand business requirements and translate them into data-driven solutions
Presented findings and recommendations to stakeholders, contributing to data-informed decision-making

interests: Reading academic publications on machine learning and data science
Experimenting with new data visualization techniques
Attending local data science meetups and conferences
data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Aadhya Sharma, a young woman with dark hair, wearing a blue blouse and a neutral expression, looking directly at the camera.
